
======Leave Marine, release marine slot to spectator======

= Description =

If player wants the spectator to take use their marine slot, enter the command [[asw_afk.wiki | /afk release]] in chat mode, marine slot will be released and taken over by spectator if any.

[[asw_afk.wiki | /afk release]] works only if [[ asw_spectator_take_slot.wiki | asw_spectator_take_slot ]] has set '1'.
